entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generator doesn't support multi-targeted projects, even if GeneratedRegexAttribute is shimmed #104212
  • Starting new Process as not child of the application #104210
  • Optimize modification of immutable struct #104209
    Future
  • [Analyzer] Use the async counterpart when available #104208
  • BinaryFormatterTestData.cs's mentioned "UpdateTestData" doesn't exist #104205
  • WasmTestOnChrome-MT-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests CI timeouts #104203

Closed

  • GetAvailablePhysicalMemory() on illumos #104211
  • Arm64/Sve: Removal of ConditionalSelect's operands when mask is AllFalse/AllTrue #104116
    9.0.0
  • Get rid of fluent assertions in System.Resources.Extensions.BinaryFormat.Tests #103278
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Normalize the creation of simd comparison nodes and give basic constant folding support #104215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Have morph normalize patterns to GT_NEG and GT_NOT #104214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: don't reorder blocks early #104213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure mini-amd64 correctly handles CMP_GT and CMP_GE for OP_XCOMPARE_FP #104206
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement `IAlternateEqualityComparer<ReadOnlySpan<char>, string>` on `EqualityComparer<string>.Default` #104202
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Centralize the folding logic for ConditionalSelect and ensure side effects aren't dropped #104175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure GetElement are marked as having an immediate operand for Arm64 #104204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Get rid of fluent assertions in System.Resources.Extensions.BinaryFormat.Tests #104166
    area-System.Resources, binary-serialization
  • Delete unnecessary StructLayout attribute in TagList.netcore.cs #104193
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Fix coreclr test readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_de… #104140
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Xml serializer test updates prep for reflection work #104173
    area-Serialization
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Improve getStaticFieldContent for classes without cctors #104054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Vector128<long> multiplication for arm64 #104177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • STJ: Support serialization callbacks for collection and dictionary types #104120
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use resumable leaf frames in CET hijack and in GC stress. #104198
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable FEATURE_MULTICASTSTUB_AS_IL for Windows x86 #104192
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use RtlDllShutdownInProgress to detect process shutdown on Windows #103877
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Integrate SimdUnicode for AVX-512 #104199
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • ARM64-SVE: GatherPrefetch #103826
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.ConditionalExtract* APIs #104150
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104111
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Convert Array.IsSimpleCopy and CanAssignArray type to managed #104103
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Dispose handles when inheritabilty is requested and O_CLOEXEC flag can't be set #104196
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tool install doesn't respect packageSourceMapping #41871

Closed

  • Unused StringWriter in GenerateToolsSettingsFile #26664

PullRequests

Updated

  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add BeforeMicrosoftNETSdkTargets #40344
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: [Allow Custom Implicit Conversion from Struct to Nullable Struct] #8255

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename 'class1' to 'Class1' lingers after IDE1006 fixer #74217

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Preserve trivia for 'Use Collection Expression' fixer in more cases #74052
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • MetadataAsSource options #74212
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #56536
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, connectionclosehttps, fortunes_dapper #56535
  • Safe StringUtilities TryGetAsciiString #56534
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56529
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #56528
  • Perf regression: json #56527
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #56526

Closed

  • Add bucket size hints to histograms #53359
    9.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid StringSegment conversions #56533
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use pattern matching #56532
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use char overloads to Join/Index strings #56531
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix typos #56530
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Annotate histograms with bucket boundaries #56500
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android, .NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 5] When building with Visual Studio 17.11.0 Preview 2.1, Maui fails randomly to import the fonts, but still finishes building without errors. #23364
  • Failure Building Due to Splash Screen Image splashSplashScreen.png #23363

Closed

  • [BUG]: NETSDK1152 Found multiple publish output files with the same relative path #23362
  • Spans with FontAttributes do not render on Android (When Span.Text uses data binding) #22491
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] RequestLayout when visibility changes (#20264) #23365
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-general

Updated

  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181
    area-testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: optimize database null-semantics propagation #34126
  • ExpressionEqualityComparer and Parameter Names #34125

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable `Resolve_scoped_application_service` test #34129
  • Enable `Max_in_multi_level_nested_subquery` test on Sqlite #34128
  • Use null propagation to optimize away `IS NOT NULL` checks #34127
  • Use XOR to translate some == and != expressions #34124

Updated

  • Translation of TimeOnly.FromTimeSpan on SQL Server no-op #34114
  • Implement `IS [NOT] DISTINCT FROM` translation #34048
  • Enable testing of compiled models in CI and on SQLite #34111
